verses.text: Prayer for deliverance. ¶ Judge me, O God, and plead my cause against an ungodly nation: Oh deliver me from the deceitful and unjust man.
For thou art the God of my strength; why hast thou cast me off? Why go I mourning [a]because of the oppression of the enemy?

Oh send out thy light and thy truth; let them lead me:
    Let them bring me unto thy holy hill,
    And to thy tabernacles.

Why art thou cast down, O my soul?
    And why art thou disquieted within me?
    Hope thou in God; for I shall yet praise him,
     the help of my countenance, and my God.
